topics.body:
Okay this is weird but first some backstory. Deco*27 is a vocaloid producer and in some opinions he's one of the best. One of his most notable works is a song called "Mozaik Role":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DnLFVUi3oOU. Apprently someone got the insane idea to turn that song into a fucking manga. Called, of course, "Mozaik Role.":www.mangahere.co/manga/mozaik_role/
Edit: Upon doing more research, the author of the manga is actually Deco himself. Weird...

topics.body:
"@Knapperx3":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54652e0c6368727307d90000#post_54652e0c6368727307d90000

welcome my friend.

in the list of things to waste time, we are quite the experts on that.

1.boring life stories about how you found a watermelon in the streets or some shit, iunno people come up with some weird life stories.
2.rabling about boring shit and how everyone around us is tupid
3.listen to music, which most of us (including me and squiggy) will try to shove down your throat so you can be one of us
4.i heard some stupid nerd here is reading some dumbass webcomic called homosuck or something, maybe ask him about that.
5.post funny images we ripped out of kym or tumblr
6.gay shit, all day all long for as long as squiggybomb and mariomarc are together (which is always)
7.DICKS
8.weeb shit like vocaloid, and touhou and anime w/e
